abstract: Six people are killed in clashes with police during demonstration in Burundi ahead of presidential election.
lead_paragraph: Burundi has been hit by violence since the announcement that the governing party had nominated President Pierre Nkurunziza to be its presidential candidate.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Burundi: 6 Are Killed During Protests

snippet: Burundi has been hit by violence since the announcement that the governing party had nominated President Pierre Nkurunziza to be its presidential candidate.
